div.ab:
Epeiph 6. Aion son of Sarapion delivered for the third new indiction for the account of villagers of Karanis, eight (and) two-thirds artabas of clean wheat, art. 8 2/3 only. (M2) I Ision, have signed. (M 1) And on the 11th, the same Aion son of Sarapion for the account of villagers of Karanis, fourteen, a half, a third, a twelfth artabas of clean wheat, art 14 1/2 1/3 1/12 only. (M3) I, Sarapion, have signed for fourteen, a half, a third, a twelfth art. (M 1) And on the 13th, the same Aion son of Sarapion for the third indiction for the account of villagers of Karanis, six artabas of clean wheat, art. 6 only. (M3) I, Sarapion, have signed for six art.
Column II
(M4) Pauni 8. Aion son of Sarapion delivered for the account of villagers of Karanis for the sixth indiction, twenty [pounds] of meat, [20] lbs.
